title: Random Forest
subject: Machine Learning
theory:
A forest of many Decision Trees. 
**Bagging**: Train each tree on a random subset of data (with replacement). 
**Feature Randomness**: Each split considers random subset of features. 
Result: Average of trees (Reduces Variance/Overfitting).

interview_questions.question: Why random features?
interview_questions.answer: Decorrelates the trees. If one Feature is strong, all trees would use it. Randomness forces diversity.

real_world_use_cases.description: Microsoft used RF for Xbox Kinect.
